name: bluebird-co
description: A set of yield handlers for Bluebird coroutines

scripts.benchmark: grunt build-benchmark && matcha benchmark/build/promises.js benchmark/build/arrays.js benchmark/build/iterables.js benchmark/build/objects.js benchmark/build/generators.js benchmark/build/thunks.js benchmark/build/errors.js
scripts.benchmark-save: grunt build-benchmark && matcha -R csv  benchmark/build/promises.js benchmark/build/arrays.js benchmark/build/iterables.js benchmark/build/objects.js benchmark/build/generators.js benchmark/build/thunks.js benchmark/build/errors.js > benchmark/results.csv

author: Aaron Trent <novacrazy@gmail.com>
